TopicTitle: New Horizons planet pack bug please help

Articles.Content: I'm going to get straight to the point. When I open my game everything works fine, but when I load my save the camera for the space center camera is trapped underground and causes me to see nothing but blackness and the sun. I have uninstalled and reinstalled both kopernicus and New Horizons as well as isolating the mods together and the bug continues to show up. I really want to make this mod work. please help
Moved to Technical Support (Modded), you'll get better help there. Good luck!

On 5/24/2017 at 7:41 PM, SuperExplosion said:

I'm going to get straight to the point. When I open my game everything works fine, but when I load my save the camera for the space center camera is trapped underground and causes me to see nothing but blackness and the sun. I have uninstalled and reinstalled both kopernicus and New Horizons as well as isolating the mods together and the bug continues to show up. I really want to make this mod work. please help

 

This sounds like a known issue having to do with New Horizons not being updated for changes in Kopernicus. When this happens create a new save and load it, possibly more than once until the space center loads normally. It is likely you will continue to experience this bug and have to keep fixing it. There are UI icons to access all the buildings, you only really need to see the space center to upgrade buildings for Career.
